posts.post_content:

Hi Marty,
E-mail sent re a Thebo 3.5 (right up your alley!) that I can sell for $150.  Includes shipping and PayPal fees (I prefer to utilize "Goods Purchased" to provide protection for both buyer and seller, and cause I feel PayPal provides a great convenient service and deserves their feeds).
Hope that helps,
--S
